RECIPE.INGREDIENT:
1/2 cup Urad Daal
 1/2 cup Moong Daal
 1 Onion finely chopped
 1 tsp Ginger
 1-2 Green Chilies finely chopped
 Salt to taste
 1/4 tsp Baking Soda
RECIPE.PROCEDURE: Pick, wash and soak daals for 3-4 hours. Grind them coarsely in a blender. Now add onions,ginger, green chilies salt and baking powder and mix well and set aside for 5 minutes. Heat oil in a pan or kadhai and deep fry a spoonful of batter till golden Serve with chutney as a breakfast or sambhar or rasam as a meal.
